thread.title: Hot Toys Reveals Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Cosbaby Figures
thread.title_full: Hot Toys Reveals Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Cosbaby Figures

author: Spencer Perry
title: Hot Toys Reveals Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Cosbaby Figures
text:
SHARE Hot Toys reveals Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Cosbaby figures 
While you can certainly expect more of their highly-detailed premium figures at a later date , Hot Toys has released a first look at their Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Cosbaby figures, which you can check out in the gallery below! 
The Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Cosbaby Bobble-Head series includes Star-Lord, Rocket, Groot, Gamora, and Drax! A special collectible set of the team is available where Rocket is exclusively crafted with velvet hair and Groot is delightfully cute and petite (standing at approximately 4cm tall)! 
Furthermore, two additional Cosbaby collectible sets are also available featuring Star-Lord flying with his jetpack and a smiling Groot; while the other collectible set features 3 extremely adorable Groot standing, sitting down with cassette tape in hand, and attacking with extending arms while dressed in his Ravagers outfit. 
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 will arrive in theaters on May 5.
